product_name: CatEye CC-VL520 Velo 7 Wired Bike Computer
long_description: This CatEye CC-VL520 Velo 7 wired bike computer keeps it simple, offering easy access to basic ride data. Large display is easy to read; auto start/stop functionality helps extend battery life. In addition to current, max and avg. speed, computer displays pace along with trip and total distance. Single button on the CatEye CC-VL520 Velo 7 wired bike computer makes it simple to operate and flip through screens.
short_description: This CatEye CC-VL520 Velo 7 wired bike computer keeps it simple, offering easy access to basic ride data.
